title: Miscellaneous fixes for RNG on CUDA
body_html:
commit 891379d3546ecd8cd5393a6d43bc7d3e81d219c5
Author: Edward Z. Yang <ezyang@fb.com>
Date:   Fri Sep 22 07:43:51 2017 -0700

    Set all GPU state, not just the first one.
    
    Signed-off-by: Edward Z. Yang <ezyang@fb.com>

commit 2a32ffd429d4452d892d3f0b1c9fb141933bd0f7
Author: Edward Z. Yang <ezyang@fb.com>
Date:   Fri Sep 22 07:36:36 2017 -0700

    Mention random_ not available on CUDA.
    
    Signed-off-by: Edward Z. Yang <ezyang@fb.com>

commit 7a30ac42c415796a8bbe413465fabe331a2d7786
Author: Edward Z. Yang <ezyang@fb.com>
Date:   Thu Sep 21 09:18:32 2017 -0700
        
    Add get_rng_state_all and set_rng_state_all.
        
    Signed-off-by: Edward Z. Yang <ezyang@fb.com>
